itemInfo.itemDesc:
The flavors of Mediah put into one dish.
- Unique effect: For 90 min:
 All AP +5
 Attack Speed +1
 Casting Speed +1
- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

item.name: Dark Pudding
item.desc:
A pudding made with suspicious ingredients. 

- Unique Effect: All AP +3 for 90 min
 Damage Against Humans +2 for 90 min

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 30 min

item.name: Dark Pudding
item.desc:

- Unique Effect: All AP +3 for 90 min
 Damage Against Humans +2 for 90 min

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 30 min

item.name: Lean Meat Salad
item.desc:
Fresh salad with slabs fo meat. 
- Unique effect: All Damage Reduction +3 for 90min
 HP Auto Recovery +5 for 90min
- How to Obtain : Can be cooked at your residence.
- Cooldown : 30min

item.name: Oatmeal
item.desc:
A mixture of grain powder and milk. 

- Unique Effect: Recover +5 Worker Stamina (Use through the Worker Menu on the world map)

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 1 sec

item.name: Exotic Herbal Wine
item.desc:
Exotic liquor which was originated from faraway country. 
- Unique effect: Fishing Speed Rank +1 for 30 min.
- How to Obtain : Can be cooked at your residence.
- Cooldown : 30 min.

item.name: Grilled Sausage
item.desc:
A sausage roasted to perfection. 

- Unique Effect: All AP +1 for 30 min

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 30 min

item.name: Bloody Dark Pudding
item.desc:
A pudding made with extremely suspicious-looking ingredients. 

- Unique Effect: All AP +3 for 110 min
 Damage Against Humans +2 for 110 min

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 30 min
